stripped_text: When you install this program, choose a server. As an additional cost to install a card in the root of or protecting that server, the Corp must pay 1 credit. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
text:
When you install this program, choose a server. As an additional cost to install a card in the root of or protecting that server, the Corp must pay 1[credit].
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
title: Diwan
